Entries.CustomZoeysNurseryZoey: @, this is my favorite! How did you find one? $h/70, 232, 228, 402, 421, 591, 376/This is an incredible gift! $h/22, 18, 106, 283, 372, -80/Oh, is this for me? I'll just put it over here... $7/346, 459, 197, 426/...Why would you give this to me? Do you need me to put it in the trash? $s/456, 211, 557, 569/Thank you, I could use one of these right now. $k//

Entries.CustomZoeysNurseryZoey0: I can't believe I am about to be married!$h
Entries.CustomZoeysNurseryZoey1: I hope I don't get cold feet

Entries.CustomZoeysNurseryZoeySupportCareer: Hello @,^Thanks so much for coming to visit me yesterday, and for being there for me. You don't know how much it means to me. I hope to see you again soon.^   -Your friend, Zoey

Entries.1111/f CustomZoeysNurseryZoey 500/t 700: sadpiano/-1000 -1000/farmer 15 14 0 CustomZoeysNurseryZoey 15 6 0/showFrame CustomZoeysNurseryZoey 23/changeMapTile Front 15 4 1453/viewport 15 9/move farmer 0 -2 0/speak CustomZoeysNurseryZoey "Mom... Why do you always have to compare me to Ella? Why can't you consider my happiness?$11#$b#I don't ask for anything from you... Just that you accept me for who I am.$11#$b#*beep beep beep*...Mom?.. Did you hang up on me??.. *click*$11"/faceDirection CustomZoeysNurseryZoey 0/changeMapTile Front 15 4 1454/pause 300/emote CustomZoeysNurseryZoey 12/pause 1000/emote farmer 8/pause 300/move CustomZoeysNurseryZoey 0 1 2/speak CustomZoeysNurseryZoey "Oh... Hello, @.$10"/pause 300/emote CustomZoeysNurseryZoey 28/move CustomZoeysNurseryZoey -3 0 3/move CustomZoeysNurseryZoey 0 2 2/move CustomZoeysNurseryZoey 1 0 1/move farmer 0 -3 3/speak CustomZoeysNurseryZoey "I guess you overheard.$s"/quickQuestion #Are you okay?#Who were you talking to?(break)speak CustomZoeysNurseryZoey "*sigh* I've been better. That was my Mom on the phone.$s"(break)speak CustomZoeysNurseryZoey "My Mom... We aren't on very good terms.$s"/speak CustomZoeysNurseryZoey "My parents have never been proud of me. Growing up, they always compared me to my sister, Ella.$s#$b#She was more successful and got better grades, so my parents always praised her and asked me why I wasn't more like her.$7#$b#I used to try so hard to make them proud. I even went to Law school like they wanted, even though I hated it.$s#$b#I finally dropped out after 3 years of making myself miserable trying to be somebody that I'm not.$s#$b#I moved here and started pursuing my dream of owning a nursery and living in the countryside.#$b#My parents have never supported my decision. My Mom calls me once a week to tell me she's dissapointed in me, and that I should get a 'real' job.$s#$b#Sometimes I wonder if she's right... It's not easy making a living this way. I thought about giving up many times.$7#$b#But I can't imagine doing anything else... Do you think I made the right decision?"/question fork1 "#Yes, you should do what makes you happy. Don't let other people dictate your life.#Your parents are right, you should get a real job."/fork 1111getarealjob/speak CustomZoeysNurseryZoey "Thank you, @. I really needed to hear that.#$b#I'm glad that I opened up to you about this. Thanks for being such a supportive friend.$h"/pause 600/move farmer 0 3 2 true/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/mail CustomZoeysNurseryZoeySupportCareer/end dialogueWarpOut CustomZoeysNurseryZoey "Thanks so much for being supportive, @."
Entries.1111getarealjob: speak CustomZoeysNurseryZoey "Oh... I really didn't think you would take my Mom's side on this.$s"pause 100/end dialogueWarpOut CustomZoeysNurseryZoey "...$a"

Entries.1111singtoplants/f CustomZoeysNurseryZoe: 50s/-1000 -1000/farmer 8 13 0 CustomZoeysNurseryZoey 14 9 1/viewport 13 7 clamp true/skippable/animate CustomZoeysNurseryZoey false true 600 22 21/move farmer 0 -4 1/move farmer 4 0 1/pause 2000/speak CustomZoeysNurseryZoey "This is the land the sunset washes, These are the banks of the Yellow Sea;$14#$b#Where it rose, or whither it rushes, These are the western mystery$14"/stopAnimation CustomZoeysNurseryZoey 12/speak CustomZoeysNurseryZoey "Oh hello @!$h"/quickQuestion #What are you doing?#Your voice sounds lovely.(break)speak CustomZoeysNurseryZoey "Oh I'm just singing. I believe that plants, like people, benefit from positive energy and attention.$h"(break)speak CustomZoeysNurseryZoey "Aw thank you so much! The daisies seem to like it, haha!$h"/speak CustomZoeysNurseryZoey "Some people think it's silly."/question fork1 "#They're right, it's kind of dumb.#I don't think it's silly. It's a lovely way to connect with your plants."/fork 1111notsilly/pause 300/emote CustomZoeysNurseryZoey 40/pause 300/speak CustomZoeysNurseryZoey "Oh, you think it's dumb?$7#$b#Well, I gotta go tend to the shop. I'm busy.$7"/friendship CustomZoeysNurseryZoey -50/pause 100/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end dialogue CustomZoeysNurseryZoey "...Do you need something?$7"
Entries.1111notsilly: emote CustomZoeysNurseryZoey 32/pause 500/speak CustomZoeysNurseryZoey "That's right! Singing makes me happy too.$h#$b#You should join me next time!$h"/friendship CustomZoeysNurseryZoey 50/pause 100/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end dialogue CustomZoeysNurseryZoey "Even if you don't like to sing, playing music around your flowers can encourage them grow$h"

Entries.1111plantflowers/f CustomZoeysNurseryZoe: SettlingIn/-1000 -1000/farmer 46 22 0 CustomZoeysNurseryZoey 51 22 0/viewport 45 22 clamp true/skippable/animate CustomZoeysNurseryZoey false true 200 19 19 20 20 19 20 20/move farmer 4 0 1/pause 2000/stopAnimation CustomZoeysNurseryZoey 19/speak CustomZoeysNurseryZoey "Oh hey there @!$6#$b#I'm just planting some iris bulbs. Would you like to help me?$6"/quickQuestion #Yes! How can I help?#Oh.. I think I'd just get in the way.(break)speak CustomZoeysNurseryZoey "Great! Come here, I'll show you what to do.$6"(break)speak CustomZoeysNurseryZoey "Aw, no you won't!$13#$b#I'll show you exactly what to do. It'll be fun!$6"/pause 300/emote farmer 32/pause 300/move farmer 0 1 2/move farmer 2 0 0/pause 1000/speak CustomZoeysNurseryZoey "Here @, loosen the soil like this, and mix in some fertilizer... see?$13#$b#That's it! then I can place the iris bulbs in the soil$6#$b#Amazing! You're really good at that. Let's keep going!$6"/playSound hoeHit/pause 300/playSound hoeHit/animate CustomZoeysNurseryZoey false true 200 19 19 20 20 19 20 20/pause 1000/playSound hoeHit/pause 300/playSound seeds/faceDirection farmer 3/pause 1000/stopAnimation CustomZoeysNurseryZoey 19/pause 2000/emote CustomZoeysNurseryZoey 8/pause 500/speak CustomZoeysNurseryZoey "@... Uhm what are you staring at?$13"/question fork1 "#Zoey, you have some dirt on your face#*blush* ...You have pretty eyes"/fork 1111prettyeyes/speak CustomZoeysNurseryZoey "hahaha! do I??$6#$b#I am always making a mess of myself out here.. Life of a gardener! I guess you can relate to that huh?$13"/pause 100/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end dialogue CustomZoeysNurseryZoey "Thanks so much for helping me today! That was really fun$h"
Entries.1111prettyeyes: emote CustomZoeysNurseryZoey 60/pause 500/speak CustomZoeysNurseryZoey "*blushing* @.. Aren't you the sweetest! Thank you$6"/pause 100/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end dialogue CustomZoeysNurseryZoey "Hey...$l#$b#Uhmm thanks so much for helping me today! That was really fun$h"

Entries.1111busstopzoey/f CustomZoeysNurseryZoey: none/-1000 -1000/farmer 13 22 0 CustomZoeysNurseryZoey 14 10 2/viewport 12 11 clamp true/skippable/move farmer 0 -10 0 true/proceedPosition farmer/move farmer 1 0 0 false/speak CustomZoeysNurseryZoey "Hey @! I'm so glad you decided to join me today."/faceDirection CustomZoeysNurseryZoey 3/pause 400/faceDirection CustomZoeysNurseryZoey 2/speak CustomZoeysNurseryZoey "Well, we'd better get going."/pause 600/move CustomZoeysNurseryZoey -2 0 0/move CustomZoeysNurseryZoey 0 -3 0 true/move farmer -2 0 0 true/move farmer 0 -4 0 true/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 4000/playSound busDoorOpen/pause 3000/speak CustomZoeysNurseryZoey "Okay, we've arrived!$h"/pause 800/changeToTemporaryMap Custom_ZoeysNurseryZuzuSeedShop/viewport -1000 -1000/addTemporaryActor Pierre 16 32 16 6 2/warp CustomZoeysNurseryZoey 16 12/faceDirection CustomZoeysNurseryZoey 0 true/warp farmer 16 13/viewport 9 9 true/move CustomZoeysNurseryZoey 0 -4 0/move farmer 0 -3 0/move farmer 1 0 0/move farmer 0 -1 0/pause 3000/speak CustomZoeysNurseryZoey "Hello, I'm here to pick up my order."/speak Pierre "Name?"/speak CustomZoeysNurseryZoey "Zoey."/faceDirection Pierre 1/faceDirection Pierre 0/pause 800/faceDirection Pierre 1/faceDirection Pierre 2/speak Pierre "That'll be 2450g"/move CustomZoeysNurseryZoey 1 0 0/pause 1000/speak CustomZoeysNurseryZoey "..."/pause 800/speak CustomZoeysNurseryZoey "Excuse me, but this order is wrong. Where are my sunflower seeds?"/speak Pierre "Sunflower seeds are in aisle 3."/speak CustomZoeysNurseryZoey "...Are you really going to make me find them myself??$a#$b#I'm a loyal customer, I order the same seeds every week, but you still can't get it right.$a"/speak Pierre "Look lady, I don't have time for this.$a#$b#If you want the seeds, you can go get them yourself.$a"/question fork1 "#Hey! Don't you dare talk to my friend like that. If you can't offer us decent service, then we're never going to shop here again!#Zoey, it's okay. Stay here, I'll go grab the seeds."/fork 1111grabtheseeds/speak Pierre "Uh...#$b#My apologies. I'll go get those seeds for you."/move Pierre -8 0 0/pause 1500/move Pierre 8 0 2/pause 800/speak Pierre "Here you go. Thanks for shopping at Seeds and More."/faceDirection CustomZoeysNurseryZoey 2/pause 800/speak CustomZoeysNurseryZoey "Let's go, @. I want to take you to my favorite ice cream shop.$h"/pause 600/move farmer 0 1 2/move farmer 0 4 2 true/move CustomZoeysNurseryZoey 0 5 2 true/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end dialogue CustomZoeysNurseryZoey "Thanks for coming with me today, @."

Entries.CustomZoeysNurseryZoey: Evelyn and I arranged the florals using flowers from my garden. Aren't they beautiful?$12#$b#I've been looking forward to this festival for weeks!$12
